levels.description: Begins cooking and stops attacking for 3 seconds. After cooking is complete, restores HP equal to <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> ATK to one allied unit within range, and grant them one of the following buffs at random: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed:0}</>, or Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</> for <@ba.vup>{up_duration:0}</> seconds
